code: import{backendLookup}from"../lookup";export function apiTweetDetail(tweetId,callback){backendLookup('GET',"/tweets/".concat(tweetId),callback);}export function apiTweetsFeed(callback,nextUrl){var endpoint="/tweets/feed/";if(nextUrl){endpoint=nextUrl.replace("http://localhost:8000/api","");}backendLookup('GET',endpoint,callback);}export function apiTweetsList(username,callback,nextUrl){var endpoint="/tweets/";if(username){endpoint="/tweets/?username=".concat(username);}if(nextUrl){endpoint=nextUrl.replace("http://localhost:8000/api","");}backendLookup('GET',endpoint,callback);}export function apiTweetCreate(callback,tweetValue){backendLookup('POST',"/tweets/create/",callback,{content:tweetValue});}export function apiTweetAction(callback,tweetId,action){var data={id:tweetId,action:action};backendLookup('POST',"/tweets/action/",callback,data);}
